entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 03:08 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: W 30 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
